title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 282/98 of 3 February 1998 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2568/91 on the characteristics of olive oil and olive-residue oil and on the relevant methods of analysis
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 282/98 of 3 February 1998 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2568/91 on the characteristics of olive oil and olive-residue oil and on the relevant methods of analysis
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Figures 1, 2, 3 and 4 annexed to this Regulation are hereby added to Annex XVIII to Regulation (EEC) No 2568/91.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 10 February 1998.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 February 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ 172, 30. 9. 1966, p. 3025/66.
(2) OJ L 206, 16. 8. 1996, p. 11.
(3) OJ L 248, 5. 9. 1991, p. 1.
(4) OJ L 341, 12. 12. 1997, p. 25.
